thread.section_title: Smith & Noble Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Smith & Noble | smithandnoble.com
thread.title: Thad

author: Thad
title: Thad
text: We had 7 windows to cover with different material option possibilities for each room. Richard Garcia's patience and expertise got us through the process with complete confidence that our order fit our needs. This order took a while to complete but his friendly manner and patience made this a pleasant experience. This is our second order with Smith & Noble and I would certainly recommend them to all.
